duties_responsibilities.duty: Handling guest room reservation requests, providing information, and answering questions related to the hotel and local area.
Blocking rooms, entering group rooming lists, posting prepayments, billing no-show reservations, and other related duties.
Answering all incoming calls, handling guest mail and faxes, and taking messages for guests.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required.
Strong command of the English language.
Basic computer skills (i.e. Word, Excel, etc.); experience working with OPERA and RESERVE or similar systems is a plus.
